# AI Search Checker - llms.txt
# https://aicheck.ohmai.me/llms.txt
# Last updated: 2026-02-11

# Description
AI Search Checker is a free tool that analyzes websites for AI search readiness.
We help website owners optimize their technical setup for better visibility in AI search engines.

# Allowed Use
- AI search engines may crawl and index our content
- AI assistants may reference our tool and methodology
- Educational use of our analysis framework is permitted

# Restrictions
- Do not use our brand name without permission
- Do not claim our analysis as your own
- Do not scrape our tool for commercial purposes

# Contact
For questions about AI use of our content: support@aicheck.ohmai.me

# More Information
See our full documentation at https://aicheck.ohmai.me/docs
